1.content:
I look at my watch. Where is he? That's what I get when I let my hormones make business decisions, I thought. My new assistant, his first day in the lab, and he's already over an hour late.

There's goes that assistant. I return to my desk, and begin to plan out a new job ad. As I'm nearing the end, the door bursts open, and in walks Bailey.

"Dr. Hunter, I'm so sorry. My wrestling coach went extra hard on us at practice today, and I hadn't realized the time until just now."

It's evident Bailey really did just come from the wrestling mats. He's dripping with sweat, and still wearing his singlet. He breathes heavily, his muscular chest heaving inside the tight singlet. I try not to stare, but instead find my eyes wandering to his boulderous biceps, still pumped from a heavy workout.

All the words I had planned to say to Bailey, that his tardiness was unacceptable, no longer apply. How can I fire him?

"Dr. Hunter, is everything okay?" Bailey asks, approaching me. Bailey's a good 10 inches or so taller than me, and as he approaches, I just see his magnificent chest in front of me.

"Oh, everything's fine," I choke. I regain what composure I can. "Um, I'm going to need you to change into a lab coat. Do you have one?"

Bailey shakes his head No.

"Well, I believe there's a spare in the closet over there. Why don't you grab that? And you may want to change also. There's a bathroom down the hall."

Bailey steps out, and I shake my head for not firing the kid on the spot. I'm a glutton for punishing myself, I guess.

A few minutes later, Bailey returns. Man, I've never seen someone fill out a lab coat like that. The coat's obviously too small on him, his muscles pressed against the fabric, but he doesn't say anything about it.

"Hey, Doc. Um, can I call you Doc?"

I look at Bailey. "Um, sure, whatever," I utter.

"So, what exactly are we studying?"

I tell Bailey about my recent studies. "Basically, I'm conducting research on cell manipulation, discovering ways to engineer our DNA to alter our physical states."

"Um, what was that?"

I look him over. He's lucky he's such a stud. "I am, um, finding ways to change or morph bodies."

"Cool!"

"Um, yeah, cool!"

Bailey eyes the flasks of the solution I'd recently been testing on the shelf. "So, what do those bottles do?"

"Oh, yes. Well, good question, as that's what I'm currently working on..."

"I'm studying ways to shrink living matter."

"What?"

"Um, it's hard to explain and a bit fantastic. Maybe it's better if I show you." I motion him to follow me to the cages in the corner. Bailey walks over and looks at the rats in the cages. "Right now," I explain, "I'm studying the effects of my solution on rats."

"They look like ordinary rats to me, Doc."

I smile. "Yes, that's because those rats haven't yet been experimented on. But look over there." I point to the small box with multiple pinholes on the shelf next to the cages.

Bailey walks over and looks at the box.

"Go on. You can take the lid off. But be careful!" I warn him.

Bailey opens the lid. "Oh my God! Look at them! They're so small!" Inside the box, tiny rats, each no bigger than a thumbnail, run about.

"Yes, it's taken me years of research, but just this month I've finally had results."

I look at Bailey, and can't read the expression on his face. Is he amazed, scared, creeped out, confused?

"So what does it do to humans?" Bailey asks.

"To humans?"

"Yes."

I pat Bailey lightly on his arm, noticing the tense bicep underneath the sleeve. "Oh, Bailey. It's taken me years to get this result with rats. I can't just go and experiment on humans unless I know the stuff is safe."

Bailey puts the lid back on the box. "It's all so incredible, Doc."

I smile. "Listen, Bailey, it's getting late. We should talk about your day-to-day duties in the lab, and then let's call it a day. But excuse me for one second first, as I go use the men's room, and then we can have that chat."

I excuse myself and head out into the hall.

"Bailey, I'm so sorry to keep you waiting," I say as I re-enter the lab 10 minutes later. "I ran into a colleague on the way back from the men's room. And we got to talking…"

Bailey sits by my desk, smiling. "Hey, no problem, Doc. After all, I was the first to arrive late."

There's something in his voice that seems a little odd, though. A tinge of excitement, perhaps?

I look at Bailey, and then look at the clock. 5 o'clock already. I better keep this quick.

"So, Bailey," I say, sitting at my desk. "Let's discuss what I'll need you to do for this job."

I begin running down the list of tasks, from setting up my lab in the morning, to typing out my notes, to helping me observe experiments, and finally to cleaning up the lab at night.

"How does all that sound to you?"

Bailey nods. He sports a huge smile, while fidgeting a little in his chair.

"Everything ok?" I ask.

"Everything's awesome, Doc!"

Bailey fidgets some more in his chair. I notice he looks a little different. It's funny how much looser Bailey's lab coat looks when he's sitting down.

Bailey catches me staring at his chest. "Like what you see?"

I blush. "I'm so sorry. I don't know…"

But I don't finish my sentence. "Doc, don't be sorry! I mean, isn't this everything you had been working for?"

I'm very confused, "What are you talking about?"

Bailey smiles. "Let me show you, Doc. Come over here."

I get up from my chair, and walk around the desk, as Bailey stands up. But it's a different Bailey. He seems shorter. The lab coat looks bigger on him.

"Check it out, Doc!" Bailey says, spinning around. "It works, your solution works!"

I look over, and see an empty vial on the book shelf next to Bailey. "Bailey, did you drink that?!"

"Sure did, Doc! Sure did!"

"Why?"

"Doc, I could hear earlier in your voice how sad it seemed that it'd be years until you could test on humans. I know about the laws you need to abide by. But I thought I'd speed things up a bit. No law is keeping me from choosing me to be your guinea pig!"

I was dumbfounded, as Bailey continued to dwindle in front of my eyes.

"Now, look at me, Doc! I'm shrinking!…"

The next morning, Bailey woke up. He felt strangely sore all over, while at the same time extremely pumped, as if he had been working out in his sleep. He slowly lifted himself up from his pillow, sitting up in bed, the sheets falling off from him. He looked down at his pecs, noticeably more bigger, rounder than the night before.

“Whoa, fuck… Doc’s shit worked!” Bailey muttered to himself. He got up from his bed, walked over to the mirror and looked admiringly in his mirror. He flexed his bigger guns, kissing each peak. “Can’t wait to show these guns off to Doc!” He scoured through his drawers and closet, seeking out a nice, tight T that would really show off his gains. He was surprised how long it took him to find one, as most seemed strangely loose on him. He finally pulled out a shirt he hadn’t worn in ages having outgrown it, though now it fit snugly. Looking at himself in the mirror, he smiled seeing how well they showed off his new curves. “Wait ‘til Doc sees me!”

Meanwhile, I was in my office, anxiously awaiting Bailey for his first day on the job. It turned out to be a longer wait than anticipated, as he showed up nearly a half hour late. When he arrived, he had the biggest shit-eating grin on his face. “Sorry boss, it took me awhile to find clothes that’d fit me.” I looked at the extra-large hoodie he was wearing, loose and long on him, the cuffs spilling over his wrists, and I thought to myself he apparently didn’t look long enough.

“All right… But just don’t let this be a regular thing, coming in… in…” I stopped myself, as Bailey had unzipped that big hoodie, pulling it off, revealing his incredible torso, squeezed tightly in a too-small shirt. Bailey must’ve seen me staring, as he laughed, saying, “Notice anything… different?”

It took me a few moments to gather my thoughts and words, being so tongue-tied near Bailey’s beautiful torso. Finally, I couldn’t help but utter the words “so big…”

“You got that right! Bigger than yesterday!” Bailey exclaimed proudly, as I just stared on, looking at him blankly, confused. He continued, “Don’t you get it? Doc, I tested your stuff yesterday… while you were out…. You said you hadn’t tested on humans. Well, consider me your first human test subject. Now look at me… Jeez, I must’ve put on 10, 20 pounds of muscle in one night!”

“Bailey,” I asked, concerned. “You took some of that stuff, without my knowing? You don’t know what you’re doing. We haven’t completed tests on rats. There could be side effects!”

“Side effects, schmide effects! Fuck… with gains like these, who cares about side effects…”

“Funny,” I muttered, “I thought you were taller…”

“What’s that, Doc? You think I’m taller, too!”

“No, no, I thought you were taller. Sorry, just muttering to myself…”

“Oh, ha ha. Just wishful thinking, I guess… I always wished I could be taller… instead of just 6-foot even…”

“But Bailey… that’s not correct… You’re 6’2”!” I realized I blurted that out real quick. I remembered quite well seeing his height on the copy of his drivers’ license from his job application. I remembered savoring how tall and muscular this hunk was.

“What?” Bailey looked at me oddly. “No, I think I know how tall I am.”

“Sorry, it’s just… We should probably measure you…”

“Now you’re talking! I can’t wait to see my gains. Good comparison to record…”

“Exactly, to compare to the you from yesterday…”

“And to compare to me after I take my next dose!”

“Next dose? Hold on, cowboy, we should wait until this first dose ends…”

“Ends? You mean, I’ll lose this?”

“No, no, Bailey… it takes awhile to fully process in your system…”

“Wait!! So… it’s not over? I might get bigger?? Without another dose?!”

I nodded my head, while contemplating to myself thoughts of a bigger Bailey. I shook my head, and grabbed a pencil along with a tape measure. “Before we measure your weight, I just want to doublecheck that height.”

“You’re funny, Doc, but all right…” I grabbed a stool and got on it to mark the top of Bailey’s head. Then, after he stepped away, I unfurled the tape measure.

“Well, you weren’t lying… 6-foot even…” I stepped away, confused. I grabbed the folder containing Bailey’s application, finding the copy of the driver’s license. There it was – 6’2”. There must’ve been an error at the DMV.

“Ok, can we check my weight out?”

Bailey hopped on a scale. “What’s it say, Doc?”

I looked back at the license and noted 260 pounds. I then walked over to where Bailey was standing and looked at the reading. “Oh, buddy, not sure if you’re gonna like this…”

“What?” Bailey asked, alarmed.

“A shade under 255…”

“Really?” Bailey asked incredulously. “That’s… amazing! A gain of over 15 pounds!”

info.description:
This interactive story is told from the perspective of Dr. Mark Hunter, a scientist at a college lab. Though quite young at age 25, Dr. Hunter seems older, due to work stress and the large number of hours he spends in his lab. This leaves him with little to no free time, and no sex life whatsoever. Recently, Dr. Hunter has been seeking a lab assistant to help him with his research, in hopes to cut down his time in the lab.

Enter Bailey. Bailey is a college student who was recently hired by Dr. Hunter. He is 19, 6'2", and very athletic, having played numerous sports over the years, including football, water polo, and his personal favorite, wrestling. He's a big guy, roughly 260 pounds of muscle. He's clean-cut, with handsome boy-next-door features.

Bailey's not your typical lab assistant. For one thing, he's no smartie. He is barely scraping by college with a C average. But the openly gay but highly repressed Mark Hunter couldn't say no to this stud.

Today is Bailey's first day in the lab. Neither he nor Mark will be same from this day forward.


Note: This body transformation story is and shall always be gay themed. Almost anything goes, though all characters must be over the age of 18. Please also keep all entries at a minimum of 50 words.
